td.content: s:patient with C/O critical severe shortness of breath at rest for 2 weeks that is frequent. pt also reports critical denial of history of cardiac disease, critical pain and swelling in the left leg. he is a 74 year old m. o:Height 180 cm, Weight 52.4 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Deep Venous Thrombosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

NKDA. pt is a 74 yo male retired. he denies drinking alcohol he smokes 1 pack a day o:Height 181 cm, Weight 54.1 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Deep Venous Thrombosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ACTIVASE - 50 mg IV, and ordered inferior vena cava filter - IVC.
